person.content:

Paragraph: It all culminated in the fact that I now have lots of great , great friends in Ireland .

Note: I have included "great friends in Ireland" as a single entity since the context suggests that the person is referring to a group of friends in Ireland, and the word "great" is used twice to emphasize the quality of the friendship rather than to refer to two separate groups of friends.
